scripts.dev: gulp copy-markdown-assets && node compress-json.mjs && astro dev
scripts.start: gulp copy-markdown-assets && node compress-json.mjs && astro dev
scripts.build: gulp copy-markdown-assets && node compress-json.mjs && astro build
scripts.preview: gulp copy-markdown-assets && node compress-json.mjs && astro preview
scripts.postinstall: gulp copy-markdown-assets && gulp copy-openmoji-data && node compress-json.mjs
